enums.name: Book
enums.doc: An enumeration for different books that appear within the Bible

props.name: abbreviation
props.doc:
A shortened version of this translation's name. 
Empty if there is no abbreviation.
Time when this translation was added to this database

bible.name: BookTranslation
bible.doc: Represents a translated book of the Bible

combo.name: ContextualBook
combo.doc: Includes information about this book's translation

props.doc: Id of the translation this book is part of

bible.name: BookStatementLink
bible.doc: Lists the statements made within a book

combo.name: VerseBeginningStatementLink
combo.doc: Represents a statement link that begins a verse. Includes verse marker information.

props.name: bookId
props.doc: Id of the book where the statement appears

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: Index that indicates, where in the book the linked statement appears

bible.name: VerseMarker
bible.doc: Locates a verse marker within a text

props.name: chapterIndex
props.doc: A 1-based index that indicates which chapter this verse belongs to

props.name: verseIndex
props.doc: A 1-based index that indicates which verse this is

props.name: firstStatementId
props.doc: Id of the book statement that starts this verse

bible.name: Footnote
bible.doc: Represents a foot note made within the original text, concerning a specific word or a statement within the test

combo.name: FootnoteWithLinks
combo.doc: A footnote which includes links to the statements made

props.name: commentedStatementId
props.doc: Id of the specific statement this footnote comments on

props.name: targetedWordIndex
props.doc: A 0-based index that specifies the word targeted within this statement. None if no specific word was targeted.

bible.name: FootnoteStatementLink
bible.doc: Links a footnote to a statement made within it

props.doc: Id of the footnote where the statement is made
Id of the statement made within the footnote

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: A 0-based index that determines where the statement appears within the footnote
